level.text: If the licensee does not reside in person on the premises and does not superintend in person the operation or conduct of the boarding house, the licensee shall designate a manager or other responsible person for the premises.
The designated manager or other person shall reside on the premises, shall superintend in person the operation or conduct of the boarding house, and shall have complete charge of the premises.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: The Housing Regulations of the District of Columbia, 5G DCRR § 4103, Commissioners’ Order 55-1503 (August 11, 1955).
